subject: Reality Television
Athletics and Sports
Television
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The four-episode run of “24/7 Penguins/Capitals: Road to the N.H.L. Winter Classic” has followed the Penguins through a winning streak, and the Capitals through a losing one.
snippet: The four-episode run of “24/7 Penguins/Capitals: Road to the N.H.L. Winter Classic” has followed the Penguins through a winning streak, and the Capitals through a losing one.
